enableTraitTokens.name: Enable Trait Tokens
enableTraitTokens.hint: Drag trait items onto the canvas to create post-it note tokens. Requires a world reload when changed.

showInfoButtons.name: Show Info Buttons
showInfoButtons.hint: Show info buttons next to Stress Track, Determination, and Values headers that display quick reference popups.

playerAmbientAudioSelectionOnly.name: Player Ambient Audio Uses Selected Tokens
playerAmbientAudioSelectionOnly.hint: If enabled, non-GM users only hear ambient audio near tokens they currently have selected/controlled (matching GM behavior). If disabled, Foundry's default behavior applies (players hear audio near all owned tokens).

traits.fatiguedTooltip: Mark this Trait as a Fatigue trait (auto-created when stress is maxed).
traits.chooseAttributeTooltip: Choose which attribute your character is fatigued in.

stress.breatherDesc: Rest for a few minutes. Recover 4 stress.
stress.breakDesc: Rest for 30 minutes to a couple hours. Recover 8 Stress.
stress.sleepDesc: A full night's rest or similar amount of time. Recover all stress.
stress.momentumDesc: Recover 1 stress per 2 Momentum spent after a successful task, max 3.

determination.gainSpend: Gain or Spend Determination by using values.
determination.spendCrit: Spend determination before rolling for a guaranteed crit.
determination.spendReroll: Spend determination after rolling to reroll any failed dice.

valuesInfo.intro: Use Values to gain or spend determination:
valuesInfo.positiveDesc: Spend determination when your value is motivating you.
valuesInfo.negativeDesc: Gain determination when your value causes a complication.
valuesInfo.challengedDesc: Gain determination when you act against your values and change them.

talentsInfo.desc: Talents give you special abilities that let you do things outside the normal rules.

focusesInfo.desc: If a focus applies, dice will crit when they are equal to or less than your discipline used in the task.

traitsInfo.intro: If a trait is both TRUE and IMPORTANT, it can:

injuriesInfo.desc: Injuries are negative traits. Removing them requires a task roll with a difficulty equal to the severity of the attack that caused them.

logsInfo.desc2: Logs track which values you used in a mission.
logsInfo.desc3: String together multiple missions using the same value by making a callback during play to earn milestone advancements.

milestonesInfo.desc1: Milestones are improvements to your character.
milestonesInfo.desc2: Earn them by making a callback to another mission using the same value as the current task roll.

directiveInfo.desc: Directives are group values, and can be used in all the same ways as a value. Ask the GM what your Mission Directives are.

dicePoolMonitor.title: Dice Pool Monitor
dicePoolMonitor.gmOnly: Only the GM can use the dice pool monitor.
dicePoolMonitor.waitingForPlayers: Waiting for players to open dice pool dialogs…

warpCalculator.title: Warp Speed Calculator
warpCalculator.instructions: Enter any two values and leave the third blank to calculate it.
warpCalculator.enterTwoValues: Enter any two values above to calculate the third.
warpCalculator.cannotCalculate: Cannot calculate with the given values.
